mng: long or drawn out, remote in time or space, leisurely, to swing, pensive, worried

exm.mng: long time ago, distant, far away
variant of 悠閒|悠闲, leisurely
to roll, to wander around, to appear repeatedly
to rock, to sway, to flicker (e.g. of lights reflected on water), to flutter (e.g. of a flag), to trick sb into doing sth, to dupe, to con
lasting for ages, long drawn out, remote in time or space, unhurried, a great number (of events), preposterous, pensive
